title: Episode #73: Cmd. Mike Adams Talks Jus Extra Bellum
itunes:title: Episode #73: Cmd. Mike Adams Talks Jus Extra Bellum
itunes:subtitle: Ben sat down with Cmd. Michael Adams, deputy legal adviser to the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, at the Pacific Command conference in Manila this week, to talk about his new paper on "Jus Extra Bellum."
description:
Ben sat down with Cmd. Michael Adams, deputy legal adviser to the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, at the Pacific Command conference in Manila this week, to talk about his new paper on "Jus Extra Bellum."
